Name: arlington_2011_sidewalk_poly
Originator: GIS Mapping Center, Arlington County, VA
OriginatorSort: GIS Mapping Center, Arlington County, VA
Abstract: This dataset represents the sidewalks (Personal house sidewalk are not captured in most areas) in Arlington County, VA 2010

    <descript>
      <abstract>This dataset represents the sidewalks (Personal house sidewalk are not captured in most areas) in Arlington County, VA 2010</abstract>
      <purpose>This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a base map to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. </purpose>
    </descript>
